++ Push Or Pull

Communications can be divided into two groups. There are advantages and disadvantages to each. It refers to the distritbution of information: 
    * Pushing is where information is delivered to all nodes from the server.
    * Pulling is when all nodes request information from the server.

Push or Pull is important for 

    * [Protocols]
    * PointConsistency
    * [Internet]
    * [LiveData]

Care should be taken to avoid polling. see NoPolling and [Notifying]

++Push
like [Polling]
Send out to all nodes
Requires the central to know clients
    * Central -> Clients


++Pull
[Notifying]
Nodes request.
Requires clients to know central
    * clients all request
    * Clients -> central
